meanings.sent1: The small business felt burdened by the overregulated rules.
meanings.sent2: The overregulated industry struggled to innovate.
meanings.sent3: The overregulated playground had more rules than a library!
meanings.sent4: Her overregulated schedule left no room for spontaneity.
meanings.sent5: The overregulated forest seemed devoid of any natural beauty.

meanings.sent1: The government tends to overregulated certain industries.
meanings.sent2: She overregulated her children's screen time.
meanings.sent3: He overregulated his diet to the point of only eating lettuce.
meanings.sent4: The coach overregulated the team's practice schedule, leading to burnout.
meanings.sent5: The strict teacher overregulated every aspect of the classroom.
